pt.ua.concurrent

Interface SyncCV

  • All Superinterfaces:
    InterruptibleAwaitingThreads
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicLockingMutexSet, Barrier, BinarySemaphore, BoundedSemaphore, CObject, CRunnable, DynamicBarrier, Event, Exchanger, ExternalBarrier, FixedBarrier, GroupMutex, GroupMutexComposedCV, GroupMutexCV, InternalBarrier, Mutex, MutexCV, MutexSetCV, PersistentSignal, RWEx, RWExCV, Semaphore, TransientSignal, TriggeredBarrier, WrapRunnable

    public interface SyncCV
extends InterruptibleAwaitingThreads
    Java's interface for condition variables.

    This class follows DbC(tm) methodology (Wikipedia). Where possible, contracts are implement with native's Java assert.

    Version:
    0.5, October 2013
    Author:
    Miguel Oliveira e Silva (mos@ua.pt)
